text:
Dr is extremely warm, patient, and detailed. His explanations were clear and he did not prescribe unnecessary medication. We were definitely in good hands.

As mentioned by another reviewer, for first time patients do register at the main lobby first before heading to the clinic.
Dr. Goh Chuan Yong was also very friendly and gave clear, detailed explanations that were easy for us as parents to understand. I highly recommend seeing Dr. Goh chuan yong

Stupid policy and procedure!

I was about to go up to consult the PD but I was told to go to main building to register first.

Really? Can't it be done in clinic? Isn't this a specilist clinic?
A professional, caring and friendly doctor. Two of my kids love him and we will only seek for Dr. Goh if sick.
A very caring, professional doctor. üëçüíó And have ample knowledge in Nutrition, always willing to share more. Totally worth 5 stars!
